title: Topic 002 Question 033
body: You have a 20-GB video file named File1.avi that is stored on a local drive.
You need to index File1.avi by using the Azure Video Indexer website.
options: Upload File1.avi to an Azure Storage queue.
Upload File1.avi to the Azure Video Indexer website.
Upload File1.avi to the www.youtube.com webpage.
